bubbleMessage.text7: Get to know a little more about me. ‚¨áÔ∏è

about.title: MY JOURNEY
about.subtitle: About
about.description: A journey of continuous growth, from academic foundations to leading innovative projects.

experience.title: Business Administration
experience.description: Professional career in Business Administration. With experience in GTH (Human Talent Management), accounting, project management and other related activities. Supporting me with different tools such as Office, Power BI and Databases (relational and non-relational).

experience.title: Software Analysis and Development
experience.description: Technologist in Software Analysis and Development with competences in requirement analysis; design, layout and development of web pages, web apps and API's. I also have solid knowledge in relational and non-relational database management as well as handling different tools for code development.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: I participated in the development of a landing page using technologies like Elementor from WordPress. Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to define and meet project requirements. Applied agile methodologies such as Scrum for task planning and execution.

experience.title: Development school
experience.description: I studied different courses on web development, databases, backend and frontend programming languages, mobile development as well as programming methods and best practices.

experience.title: React Native Instructor
experience.description: I designed and taught an introductory virtual React Native course with a practical focus, tailored to the context of mobile projects. I explained important concepts such as functional components, the use of Hooks (useState, useEffect), screen navigation, and basic API consumption, promoting best practices and proper structuring of mobile projects.

experience.title: SENA Intern
experience.description: Design, development, and implementation of assigned projects using the Power Platform suite. Database modeling and deployment in SharePoint as well as the development of mobile and web solutions with Power Apps. Development of automations with Power Automate and API code development and refactoring with Python and vanilla JavaScript frontend.

univalleapp.title: Univalle App
univalleapp.description: Web and mobile application for process optimization at Universidad del Valle.

todosapp.title: ToDo's App
todosapp.description: Web application for the management of notes and tasks.

hero.title: Select a project to see how it was worked on.
